item.title: Hi, I'm Kamal!
item.description: Short Story I’m currently working as a Backend Developer at Bukalapak, one of the largest e-commerce company in Indonesia. In 2016, me with other colleagues founded DAGOZILLA ITB, back then still a Mobile Soccer Robot Team that compete annually in a local RoboCup Middle Size League-typed competition named KRSBI-B (Kontes Robot Sepak Bola Indonesia Beroda). After graduated from Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB), I still gave advices and helped the team become more established.

item.title: C++ MJPEG over HTTP Library
item.description: https://github.com/nadjieb/cpp-mjpeg-streamer Features No OpenCV dependencies (Clear problems separation) Set different streams depending on HTTP GET path Multi-threaded streaming Single Header-only library Graceful shutdown

item.title: Gawe
item.description: https://github.com/nadjieb/gawe Description Gawe is a Go library for processing background jobs using Go channels as FIFO queue to control the job execution and worker instantiation. Installation go get -u github.com/nadjieb/gawe

item.title: DAGOZILLA ITB
item.description: About Founded in 2016, DAGOZILLA ITB is a research team from Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) which focuses on Mobile Robot Development. Co-founded and built a strong multidisciplinary engineering team. Developed vision system with OpenCV in C++ for Mobile Soccer Robots. Guided the team until in 2020 to be qualified for RoboCup Middle Size League for the first time (https://msl.robocup.org/news/2020-qualification-results). Links Website: https://dagozilla.itb.ac.id/ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dagozilla-itb Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dagozillaitb/
